channel.title: Help please making a new server
channel.description:
i need help with the server im making first off i need a source i dont understand if i need to download another program more than moparscape i got my no-ip set up but it only plays in my network ip . i dont know how to code and am i correct when i say that client.java is in the server source i downloaded in the folder? please answer and dont hate im new to making servers i really desparetly need help
thanks,
-ivan
ps. dont hate on this topic or call me noob i alrady kno i am just dont hate also, if you have any links to any sources or other forums that can really help me please post.

ha go for it

item.title: Help please making a new server
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

[quote=“bigh51, post:14, topic:225720”][quote author=00rYn00 link=topic=296630.msg2390567#msg2390567 date=1218946399]
wow… that was a very interesting argument… pretty much all I read was different variations of the word fuck…
I mean seriously though, obviously this guy is new, and he is right, the point of the forums is to help people using your knowledge and others… but really, all I’ve been seeing (even when I ask for help) is just a bunch of dicks typing in a whole shit load of spam and telling me how much of a noob I am, instead of helping me with my problem… I’m fucking tired of you ass holes!

and to answer your question ivan,
no you can not make a server from scratch if you are using a source…

[/quote]If you help newcommers you are guarenteed to get 12334534534 more topics on “how do i add/fix X”[/quote]

So? you don’t have to help them directly, you can give them a link for a tutorial, or tell them to check in the tutorial section… you don’t have to go on their topic and type about 15 different variations of the word fuck and shit and make them mad at you… Do you seriously even code/modify/play stuff on moparscape?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please making a new server
item.dc:creator: @modbrian modbrian
item.description:
@modbrian wrote:

[quote=“XChallenge, post:9, topic:225720”][quote author=modbrian link=topic=296630.msg2384376#msg2384376 date=1218700390]

yeah u cant make a server from scratch if your using a source

but atleast i didnt go an flame your heeps -.^
guyz when people make simple mistakes dont go an flame em…
just tell em what they did rong?

if i wanted to name everything he did wrong id still be here typing next week…
[/quote]
NO FLAMING.
Your name is not allowed to have the word MOD in it…[/quote]

fuck you im obviously NOT a mod so why do you care if it says " mod" in my name
